title: For Sale: Huge assortment of SGC 40 t206 cards, incl. HOFers and SLers
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale: Huge assortment of SGC 40 t206 cards, incl. HOFers and SLers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: rob
Hello all,

I have a large list of SGC 40 cards for sale. Sorry about the slightly confusing list, but unless there is a $amount next to the 40 (which is the SGC grade) then the card is worth $35. I am looking now for packages of 5 cards, then I will take care of the shipping. So 5 regular cards for $175 or adjust the price according to the price next to the card. Again, the 40 is simply the SGC grade listed, not the price, for most of the cards.

rgutheil@gmail.com to reserve your group. paypal adds 3%.

I have few scans, but do have the Johnson and kelley.

Rob
